Deadline: 11 Oct 2019 1200 HKT

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdiQnLntDvYlKqRHp1rLI4TDoGUFOv9aNP_owlxajzg_U9oKw/viewform

英文：Promotes hate, violence or illegal/offensive activities
